q: Within technology circles, the move by Google Inc. -- born during the first dot-com boom-- to replace CEO Eric Schmidt with the 38-year-old Page left some wondering how the search giant would deal with middle age. Founder becoming CEO... Is this like a Steve Jobs returning or a Jerry Yang returning? Chris Dixon, a technology veteran who has invested in Skype and Foursquare, tweeted.
